code: import{useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReviewModal(_ref){let{setReviews,setShowModal}=_ref;const[comment,setComment]=useState("");const[rating,setRating]=useState("");const{id}=useParams();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const parsedRating=rating?parseFloat(rating):"";setReviews(prev=>[...prev,{movieId:id,comment:comment,rating:parsedRating}]);setShowModal(false);setComment("");setRating("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-backdrop d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content p-4 rounded bg-white",style:{width:"400px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"mb-3",children:"Add Review"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Comment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",onChange:e=>setComment(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"form-label",children:"Rating"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",className:"form-control",onChange:e=>setRating(e.target.value),min:"1",max:"5",step:"1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-end gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-secondary",onClick:()=>setShowModal(false),children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Save"})]})]})]})});}export default ReviewModal;
